caption: A group of people is sitting in a room, contemplating. There's a large strawberry on a dining table. A boy and a girl approach a window, then take an elevator ride. Afterward, they use a small bowl to reach under a bed. An elderly man slides down a pipe and arrives in a dining room. A car leaves the house in the night. A boy and a woman arrive at a house, and a man opens the door for them. The man helps the boy carry a suitcase into a room and then heads upstairs. The boy enters a bedroom and opens the suitcase, revealing two miniature people who run out and hide in a small hole. There are many spiderwebs and mushrooms in this setting.
